title: Lost about LOST? Me Too.
body: <p>Since I missed almost the entire <a href="http://www.amazon.com/exec/obidos/redirect?link_code=ur2&amp;camp=1789&amp;creative=9325&amp;path=tg/detail/-/B00005JNOG/qid=1128379046/sr=1-1/ref=sr_1_1?v=glance%26s=dvd&amp;tag=dieselhome-20" title="LOST Season 1 on DVD">first season</a>, I've been struggling to keep up with WTF is going on with the show. Here're some resources that I've found that'll help you along the way.</p><ul><!-- <li><a href="" title=""></a></li> --><li><a href="http://abc.go.com/primetime/lost/" title="ABC's Lost">abc's official site</a> - standard network stuff</li><li><a href="http://www.oceanicflight815.com/" title="LOST">Oceanic Flight 815</a> - the episode guide is great if you've missed a show (or the entire first season, like me)</li><li><a href="http://www.oceanic-airlines.com" title="">Oceanic Airlines</a> - be sure to check out the <a href="http://www.oceanic-airlines.com/seatingchart.htm">seating chart</a>. While viewing the html source I've found a few other clues as well. <ul><li>Like three images: <ul><li><a href="http://www.oceanic-airlines.com/images/navi_right_shadow.jpg">claires_ticket.jpg</a></li><li><a href="http://www.oceanic-airlines.com/images/navi_bottom_shadow.jpg">egg2.jpg</a></li><li><a href="http://www.oceanic-airlines.com/images/navi_top_shadow.jpg">egg3.jpg</a> (yay javascript!)</li></ul></li><li>And these passages: <ul><li>"If anyone should find this message, please get word I'm alive and stranded on an island somewhere in the South Pacific. Please send help soon. Things are bad. And they're getting worse... [-Sally]"</li><li>and "I survived a horrific plane crash and am stranded on an island somewhere Northeast of Australia and Southwest of Hawaii. In the event that I am never found, please forward word of my fate to my parents. [-Robert]"</li><li>"I would like to inform my financial institutions that I will be late making my September mortgage payment as I am STRANDED ON A FRIGGIN' ISLAND IN THE MIDDLE OF NOWHERE!  <br />Please have the Government send a search team immediately.  OR don't.  Shouldn't all the taxes I pay cover an expense like that?"</li><li>I survived a horrific plane crash and am stranded on an island somewhereNortheast of Australia and Southwest of Hawaii. In the event that I amnever found, please forward word of my fate to my parents.</li></ul></li><li><a href="http://register.go.com/abc/lost/IslandInsider/quiz">Weekly Trivia Contest</a></li></ul></li><li><a href="http://www.flickr.com/photos/sh/47743274/" title="Mystery behind the numbers solved?">Mystery behind the numbers solved?</a> (from <a href="http://digg.com/links/Mystery_behind_numbers_in_Lost_solved_">digg</a>)</li></ul><p><strong>Update 2005/10/04:</strong> I've found a few more quotes in the HTML source and new link.</p>
bodyArticleHtml:
2005-10-03

Lost about LOST? Me Too.

Since I missed almost the entire
If anyone should find this message, please get word I'm alive and stranded on an island somewhere in the South Pacific. Please send help soon. Things are bad. And they're getting worse... [-Sally]

I survived a horrific plane crash and am stranded on an island somewhere Northeast of Australia and Southwest of Hawaii. In the event that I am never found, please forward word of my fate to my parents. [-Robert]

I would like to inform my financial institutions that I will be late making my September mortgage payment as I am STRANDED ON A FRIGGIN' ISLAND IN THE MIDDLE OF NOWHERE!
Please have the Government send a search team immediately. OR don't. Shouldn't all the taxes I pay cover an expense like that?
